headline: KKR Announces New Managing Directors
summary: NEW YORK, December 04, 2024--KKR today announced a newly promoted group of 41 Managing Directors, effective January 1, 2025.

headline: KKR Partners with Former Halma CEO Andrew Williams to Pursue Investments in the Industrials Sector and in the UK
summary: LONDON, December 04, 2024--KKR, a leading global investment firm, today announced it is partnering with Andrew Williams, former long time CEO at Halma plc ("Halma"), to pursue new acquisition opportunities in the Industrials sector and more broadly across leading UK businesses. Andrew will assume the role of Executive Advisor to KKR.
